dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1043 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the energy credit for qualified fuel cell property.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Graham (for himself and Mr. Blumenthal) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the energy credit for qualified fuel cell property.

section.header: Extension of energy credit for qualified fuel cell property

subsection.text: Section 48(c)(1)(E) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking January 1, 2025 and inserting January 1, 2033.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to property the construction of which begins after December 31, 2024.
